title: Ice
description: A signaling message sent from a client with a WebRTC Ice to another client, and transiting through the signaling server

metadata.description: The mandatory Metadata dictionary describing the API version and its origin

signalingType.description: The type of signaling message that is being sent or received

sender.description: The sender address in the format IP:port as perceived by the signaling server
sender.$comment: This property is optional and will be filled by the server when not assigned from the sender itself

target.description: The target address in the format IP:port as set by the sender
target.$comment: In the context of a WebRTC session, this property is mandatory

content.description: The content of the message being carried over the signaling API

sdpCandidate.description: The Session Description protocol (SDP) Candidate of the local peer following a WebRTC RTCIceCandidate event
sdpCandidate.$comment: For more details about the sdpCandidate, please visit MDN https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebRTC_API

sdpMLineIndex.description: The index of the media description of the SDP candidate following a WebRTC RTCIceCandidate event
sdpMLineIndex.$comment: For more details about the sdpMLineIndex, please visit MDN https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebRTC_API

sdpMid.description: The media stream identification of the SDP candidate following a WebRTC RTCIceCandidate event
sdpMid.$comment: For more details about the sdpMid, please visit MDN https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebRTC_API
